definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Calcite Mineral Kingdom concludes with this suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 方解石矿石王国与此建议有协约。

sentences.english: Yellow Calcite is holding the breath of life tone in the Language of Light.
sentences.chinese: 黄色方解石持有光之语中生命呼吸的音调。

sentences.english: In the shell, mineral form of calcium carbonate is calcite and aragonite.
sentences.chinese: 贝壳中的碳酸钙是以文石和方解石形式存在。

sentences.english: Prismatic crystal of Barite on Calcite crystals.
sentences.chinese: 柱状晶形的重晶石在方解石晶簇上。

sentences.english: The effect of solid concentrations on the electrokinetic behavior of calcite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了固体浓度对方解石动电行为的影响。

sentences.english: The Calcite Mineral Kingdom addresses you today.
sentences.chinese: 今天是方解石王国向你们问候。

sentences.english: Yellow calcite also assists in the repair of the creative body in ascension.
sentences.chinese: 黄色方解石也协助提升中创造性身体的修复。

sentences.english: They select high purity and high whiteness calcite as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 他们选择高纯度，高白度的方解石为原料。

sentences.english: We can be conveniently studied with reference to a crystal of calcite or iceland spar.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以很方便地以方解石或冰洲石晶体来进行研究。

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
